TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Brushes extends System.Object

summary.span: 所有標準色彩的筆刷。

span.span: Brushes for all the standard colors.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含`static`傳回的唯讀屬性物件的屬性名稱所指示的色彩。The class contains `static` read-only properties that return a object of the color indicated by the property name. 您通常不必明確處置的屬性，以在此類別中，所傳回的筆刷，除非它用來建構新的筆刷。You typically do not have to explicitly dispose of the brush returned by a property in this class, unless it is used to construct a new brush. 如需筆刷，這個類別中所表示的色彩的詳細資訊，請參閱[Colors by Name](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92332)。For more information about the colors represented by the brushes in this class, see [Colors by Name](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92332). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的成員類別，以填滿。The following code example demonstrates the how to use a member of the class to fill a . 此範例應該使用與 Windows Form。This example should be used with a Windows Form. 此程式碼貼入表單和處理的表單時，呼叫這個方法事件，傳遞`e`做為。Paste this code into a form and call this method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as .
